TopicTitle: The complete(ish) history of rockets! Recreating the entire space race in KSP!

You might be able to improve your framerate by going into the options and moving the "max physics delta time" slider all the way to the right.
Mulbin if I may make a suggestion?

Mulbin if I may make a suggestion?

I tried it a while ago, but I agree, I'd love to see what Mulbin can do.
Mulbin Got any Updates?

Mulbin Got any Updates?

Not yet... was distracted by career mode for a while, now I'm working on making Munbug XI into a much more accurate Apollo replica. Then I'll get back on this.
Take your time. This kind of dedication in a thread is rarely seen, and everyone needs a break here any there to re-energize (and play career mode!)
Mulbin this thread is simply amazing, thanks.

You might be able to improve your framerate by going into the options and moving the "max physics delta time" slider all the way to the right.

less lag but still to much
So...this dead?

So...this dead?

no... just been on other projects, might see if I can get the next rocket started after I finish cleaning up project Moho.

This is a duplicate from my ship yard thread... it covers all of my projects including the space race so thought I'd put it here too to keep people up to date on what is happening with this thread... no it's not dead!

Progress update...

Things have slowed down a little, partly due to being busy and partly waiting for .23 before getting to into my designs.

I haven't completely stopped however... I'm just in the final testing stage for my new improved Mercury Atlas (pics below), after this I plan a complete rebuild of my Gemini Titan and Atlas Agena for my project Jebini thread. Once the new Titan and Agena are made they will lead on nicely to maybe make a few more launches for my space race thread (Thor Agena is next in the timeline... and Titan 1 not long after).

I am also in the final stages of refining my Soyuz, which I hope to get out before Christmas.

So coming releases should be in this order - Mercury Atlas, Soyuz, Gemini, Atlas Agena, Thor Agena....

I am still flying Munbug XI with very little in the way of tweaks to the design so wont need to update for a little while.
So to summarise for this thread... Thor Agena - Soon!
I love this! I enjoy watching your recreation of these historic events. Really cool stuff.
Hey! Love this! One question? Is there a way you can upload the flags? I enjoy them!

Thanks, its had to go on hold for a while while I work on other stuff!

You can get the flags here! http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/48679-Mulbin-s-Flags-Custom-mission-flag-collection
So, have you considered using Earth for these?

This is definitely one of the best threads I've ever seen on these forums. I hope that you get back to working on this soon.

Also will you only do rockets until 1970 or also do some of the most famous rockets after that, for example Delta-IV, Pegasus and Space shuttle? Because I would really like to see how well you could do them.

Trouble is... baby on the way! But one day, I'll get back on it...

at the moment I've concentrated my efforts on my simpit control panels.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66742-Custom-hardware-control-switch-panel-simpit-WIP
Congratulations! Hope things go smoothly for you all.

Congratulations! Hope things go smoothly for you all.
